title: disconnecting..?
body: I'm waiting for the loading screen to load, and it still doesn't. This has happened twice now, and I really don't want LPQ, hellp.?

replies.body: Double check your firewall settings to make sure they aren't blocking your network from reaching our servers. It's not uncommon for this to happen, especially after Windows Updates or League Patches roll out. Follow [**these steps**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664#mq3), and let me know if they don't help!
I have the same problem, where do you live and what is your internet provider {{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}
